  "Allegations" : "CLAIMANTS ALLEGE THAT FRED WRIGHT, A REGISTERED REPRESENTATIVE OF VALIC FINANCIAL ADVISORS, FAILED TO EXECUTE THE SALE OF CLAIMANTS' PREFERRED STOCK WHICH HAD BEEN ISSUED BY METROPOLITAN MORTGAGE & SECURITIES COMPANY.
